newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - July 13.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - July 13.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi agriculture and water minister says new Shuaiba desalination plant is to cost 5.3 billion riyals.
- Saudi defence and foreign ministers are invited to visit South Africa this year.
- Ministry of commerce seized 52,000 jars of imitation Vaseline in Jeddah.
- Around 95 percent of foreign workers are employed by the private sector.
- Saudi-French joint ventures operating in the kingdom in the six months to last October were worth 2.8 billion riyals.
